item.title: Home
item.description: My name is Graham and I’m a Software Engineer building NLP data pipelines at ROSS Intelligence in Toronto, Canada. I’ve shared the code for my thesis work on GitHub. Related papers can be found in my list of publications. Also on GitHub, a Knowledge-Based System for designing electrical inductors built for a course during my Master’s.

item.title: Publications
item.description: Bubble Cam: A Commercial-Grade Spherical Camera This publication is a result of image stitching work done in Collaboration with Ryerson, OCE, and a private company. Study of Estimation of Distribution Algorithms Applied to Neuroevolution This thesis proposed a methodology for the automatic design of neural networks via Estimation of Distribution Algorithms (EDA). The method evolves both topology and weights. To do so, topology is represented with a fixed-length, indirect encoding; weights are represented as a bitwise encoding.
